name: Spectravibe
details:
Analog Multi-FXThe Endangered Audio Research Spectravibe is an all-analog multi-effect pedal that is about to become your pedalboard's new secret weapon. Based off the retired Gristleizer stompbox, the Spectravibe is a new evolution in modulation and distortion that is destined to become the pulsating heart of your rig.
http://www.endangeredaudioresearch.com/pedals/#/spectravibe/
